revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #46 Tanga |image = [[File:Tanga.png]] |caption = The flower grows at the tip of this Berry. It attracts Bug Pokémon by letting its stringy petals stream out. The attracted Bug Pokémon decreases the amount of harvestable Berries in nearby plants |growtime = 1h 0m 0s |harvest = 3 berries |replant = 50% |points = 500 |flavor =
*20 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Tanga''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with 8 [[Rindo]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-450s || 450-900s || 900-1800s || 1800-3600s || 3600-7200s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:TangaTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:TangaTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:TangaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Tanga berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rindo.png|30px]]
